entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 10:08 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: S 56 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
